name: Bewilder House: Enhanced Edition
summary:
Bewilder House is a classic first-person horror puzzle game that challenges your perception and willpower. Trapped in shifting mazes where the walls open and close when you're not looking, you'll need to rely on your mind and first-person controls to navigate a deceptive funhouse that manipulates your surroundings and your sense of reality. Every corner hides a new obstacle; every escape is just another illusion.

This enhanced edition brings minor improvements that breathe new life into the classic Bewilder House experience, making it easier to immerse yourself in the twisted horrors lurking within. Key Features:

Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Feel the pressure as you confront the unsettling twists and turns of a world that isn’t as it seems.

Challenging Puzzles: Solve mind-bending puzzles that play with both your sense of direction and your reality.

Enhanced Performance: Smoother frame rates and optimized controls for a more responsive and enjoyable experience.Note: The enhanced edition has no extra in-game content compared to the original.
